predicate.note: Frames file for 'nullify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: DPC, an investor group led by New York-based Crescott Investment Associates, had itself filed a suit in state court in Los Angeles *trace* seeking *trace* to nullify the agreement.
example.arg: *trace* -> *trace* -> DPC, an investor group led by New York-based Crescott Investment Associates,
